Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Jong Thae Un 
   Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Thursday sent a wreath to the bier of Jong Thae Un who was a winner of Kim Il Sung Order and old-age pensioner after acting a party official for years, expressing deep condolences over his death.
